statements: SELECT * FROM DecisionTrees
SELECT node_name, feature_name FROM DecisionTrees
SELECT feature_name, feature_value FROM DecisionTrees WHERE feature_name = 'age'
SELECT * FROM DecisionTrees WHERE parent_id = 1 ORDER BY node_name DESC
SELECT id, node_name, feature_name FROM DecisionTrees WHERE feature_value > 0.5
SELECT * FROM DecisionTrees WHERE feature_name = 'Age' ORDER BY feature_value DESC;
SELECT id, parent_id, node_name FROM DecisionTrees WHERE feature_name LIKE '%Gender%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_nodes FROM DecisionTrees WHERE feature_name = 'Height';
SELECT DISTINCT feature_value FROM DecisionTrees WHERE feature_name = 'Weight' ORDER BY feature_value ASC;
SELECT node_name, feature_value FROM DecisionTrees WHERE parent_id IS NOT NULL AND feature_name = 'Income' ORDER BY feature_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM DecisionTreeNodes WHERE node_id = 1;
SELECT node_id, node_data FROM DecisionTreeNodes WHERE parent_node_id IS NULL;
SELECT node_id, parent_node_id FROM DecisionTreeNodes ORDER BY parent_node_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM DecisionTreeEdges WHERE parent_node_id = 2;
SELECT edge_id, child_node_id FROM DecisionTreeEdges WHERE edge_id <= 5;
SELECT * FROM DecisionTreeNodes WHERE node_id = 1
SELECT node_id, node_data FROM DecisionTreeNodes WHERE parent_node_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM DecisionTreeEdges WHERE edge_id > 5 ORDER BY edge_id DESC
SELECT node_id, parent_node_id, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(node_data) as data_length FROM DecisionTreeNodes WHERE parent_node_id = 2
SELECT * FROM DecisionTreeEdges WHERE parent_node_id = 5 AND child_node_id = 7
SELECT * FROM DecisionTrees;
SELECT node_id, node_type, node_value FROM TreeNodes;
SELECT tree_id, parent_node_id FROM TreeEdges;
SELECT * FROM DecisionTrees WHERE node_type = 'Root';
SELECT tree_id, COUNT(*) FROM TreeNodes GROUP BY tree_id;
SELECT * FROM DecisionTrees WHERE tree_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT node_type, node_value FROM TreeNodes WHERE tree_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000' ORDER BY node_type DESC;
SELECT node_type, COUNT(*) FROM TreeNodes GROUP BY node_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT parent_node_id FROM TreeEdges WHERE child_node_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001';
SELECT tree_id, node_type FROM TreeNodes JOIN DecisionTrees ON TreeNodes.tree_id = DecisionTrees.tree_id ORDER BY node_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM decision_trees;
SELECT value, parent_id FROM decision_trees ORDER BY parent_id DESC;
SELECT node_value, node_id, parent_node_id FROM tree_nodes WHERE tree_id = 1;
SELECT link_id, node_id FROM tree_links WHERE child_node_id = 5;
SELECT tree_name, created_at FROM tree_metadata ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM decision_trees WHERE id = 5;
SELECT tree_name, created_at FROM tree_metadata;
SELECT node_id, tree_id FROM tree_nodes ORDER BY node_id DESC;
SELECT node_value FROM tree_nodes WHERE tree_id = 10 AND parent_node_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM tree_metadata WHERE tree_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT tree_id FROM tree_nodes);
SELECT * FROM DecisionTrees;
SELECT name, parent_id FROM DecisionTrees ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, parent_id FROM DecisionTrees WHERE parent_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Nodes WHERE tree_id = 3;
SELECT id, action FROM Actions WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM DecisionTrees;
SELECT id, name FROM Nodes WHERE tree_id = 1 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT c.id, c.condition, a.action FROM Conditions c JOIN Actions a ON c.id = a.id WHERE c.id < 10;
SELECT s.id, s.name, s.description FROM Strategies s WHERE s.name LIKE '%strategy%' AND CHAR_LENGTH(s.description) > 100 ORDER BY s.id ASC;
SELECT d.id, d.name, n.name AS parent_name FROM DecisionTrees d LEFT JOIN DecisionTrees n ON d.parent_id = n.id ORDER BY d.id ASC;
